name: Temporary File
summary: A $$$ file is a temporary file created by various programs to store backup data for the original file in case it becomes corrupted, the software crashes, or the user needs to recover unsaved changes. It may contain plain text or binary data specific to the software, depending on the program that created it. $$$ files are not meant to be opened manually but may be helpful for data recovery if an application crashes unexpectedly.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Open with the same program that created the file
